Description: Testing homepage load time and responsiveness
Test Case: Page loads within 3 seconds on desktop
Comments: Responsive design checked on multiple screen sizes

Test Case: All sections are visible on screen
Expected Result: Hero, categories, and testimonial sections are visible
Comments: Sections appear in correct order and layout on desktop and mobile

Test Case: Product title, price, and description should be displayed
Expected Result: Product information should be visible on the product page
Actual Result: All product details visible as expected
Comments: Product details are rendered correctly for different products

Test Case: Add product to cart and check cart item count
Total price of items in cart is correct
Expected Result: Cart total should match the price of added items

Test Case: Checkout page loads correctly with all necessary fields
Expected Result: Checkout page should load with billing, shipping, and payment fields
Comments: All necessary fields present and correctly functioning
Tested with a valid payment method

Test Case: Page layout adjusts correctly on mobile screens
Expected Result: Layout should be responsive on screens below 768px

Test Case: SEO tags are present and correct
Expected Result: Title, meta description, and keywords should be set correctly
Comments: SEO meta tags are correct for all pages
